MF2 reference in Fairy Hare description...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): MF2 reference in Fairy Hare description...
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, January 31, 2012 - 05:32 am:

Just thought I'd point out that the description for Fairy Hare references the insane speed glitch in Monster Farm 2 for Fairy Hare which made it insanely popular there.

Mepersoner also won the biggest MR2 tournament ever with one as well. Even without the glitch, it was the champion of the monsters.

By GM on Tuesday, January 31, 2012 - 06:00 pm:

What was this glitch, exactly?

And to add to the pile, Melcarba's description has a reference to its MR2 card, wherein it's referred to as a prototype robot monster built before Henger. There might even be a few others, as well.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, February 1, 2012 - 07:13 pm:

In MF2, Fairy Hare had insane speed. IIRC it was as if the stat, whatever you had it at, had the decimal in the number moved over one place. So, 999 was like 9,999 and, 99 was like 999.

By GM on Wednesday, February 1, 2012 - 10:06 pm:

Good.

Gravy.

By Penguin God on Friday, February 3, 2012 - 05:29 pm:

Welp time to throw in MR2 and raise a fairy hare.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, February 3, 2012 - 05:50 pm:

It was fixed in MR2, the glitch was only in MF2.
